languages.text: "Я не могу вам запретить это сделать. Но не могу не отметить — это не самое мудрое решение. При всем уважении, Ваша Cветлость".
"I can't bar you from doing so. But I can't help but note that it's not the wisest course of action. With all due respect, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
languages.original_text: "Я не могу вам запретить это сделать. Но не могу не отметить — это не самое мудрое решение. При всем уважении, Ваша Cветлость".

traits.locale_text: "I can't bar you from doing so. But I can't help but note that it's not the wisest decision. With all due respect, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
"I can't bar you from doing so. But I can't help but note that it's not the wisest decision. With all due respect, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
"I can't bar you from doing so. But I can't help but note that it's not the wisest course of action. With all due respect, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
"I can't bar you from doing so. But I can't help but note that it's not the wisest course of action. With all due respect, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
"I can't bar you from doing so. But I can't help but note that it's not the wisest course of action. With all due respect, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

languages.text: 「私に君を止めることはできない。しかし、それは何より賢明な行動ではないとは進言させてもらおう。敬意を込めて、陛下」
languages.original_text: "I can't bar you from doing so. But I can't help but note that it's not the wisest course of action. With all due respect, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: 「私に君を止めることはできない。しかし、それは何より賢明な行動ではないとは進言させてもらおう。敬意を込めて、陛下」

languages.text: “我无权阻止您这么做。但恕我直言，大人，我不得不指出，这并不是明智的做法。”
languages.original_text: "I can't bar you from doing so. But I can't help but note that it's not the wisest course of action. With all due respect, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: “我无权阻止您这么做。但恕我直言，大人，我不得不指出，这并不是明智的做法。”

languages.text: «No estoy en condición de prohibírselo, pero he de advertirle de que no es el proceder más indicado. Con el debido respeto, {mf|milord|milady}».
languages.original_text: "I can't bar you from doing so. But I can't help but note that it's not the wisest course of action. With all due respect, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: «No estoy en condición de prohibírselo, pero he de advertirle de que no es el proceder más indicado. Con el debido respeto, {mf|milord|milady}».

languages.text: « Je ne peux pas vous l'interdire, mais permettez-moi de vous faire remarquer que l'idée est imprudente. Avec tout le respect que je vous dois, Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: "I can't bar you from doing so. But I can't help but note that it's not the wisest course of action. With all due respect, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne peux pas vous l'interdire, mais permettez-moi de vous faire remarquer que l'idée est imprudente. Avec tout le respect que je vous dois, Votre Seigneurie. »

languages.text: "Ich kann Euch nicht daran hindern. Aber ich möchte anmerken, dass es kein besonders kluges Vorgehen ist. Bei allem Respekt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."
languages.original_text: "I can't bar you from doing so. But I can't help but note that it's not the wisest course of action. With all due respect, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann Euch nicht daran hindern. Aber ich möchte anmerken, dass es kein besonders kluges Vorgehen ist. Bei allem Respekt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."

languages.text: "Bunu yapmanızı engelleyemem ama pek akıllıca bir hareket olmadığını belirtmeden edemeyeceğim. Saygım sonsuz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
languages.original_text: "I can't bar you from doing so. But I can't help but note that it's not the wisest course of action. With all due respect, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: "Bunu yapmanızı engelleyemem ama pek akıllıca bir hareket olmadığını belirtmeden edemeyeceğim. Saygım sonsuz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
